content: introducing our free crochet fried egg pattern kids love to join in the kitchen explore with our crochet egg pattern blending crafting and cooking for special memories however you choose to unleash your creativity i hope you ll find lots of joy and satisfaction in crocheting your fried egg happy crocheting ideal for all skill levels whether you re a beginner or an experienced crocheter this pattern is written for everyone perfect for gifting create a unique handcrafted gift that will be cherished for years perfect for hobby enthusiasts grow your crochet skills while making an easy toy ❌ you do not have permission to recopy rewrite or redistribute this pattern in any form you may not resell my patterns but you are welcome to sell any of the items you make from my patterns on a small scale i would love it if you would tag stitched safari in your creations pattern available in english only us terminology
